title: Social Constructivist-Based Instructional Design Strategies in Mobile Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogical knowledge, digital literacy, and understanding of elementary social studies curriculum
context.additional_context: Focus on preservice teachers applying sociocultural constructivist approaches in mobile learning environments and designing learner support strategies across multiple contexts (social, physical, technological)

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative activities that promote social interaction in mobile learning environments.
Learners can develop instructional activities reflecting technology integration and physical contextual considerations in BYOD environments.
Learners can apply scaffolding strategies utilizing diverse representation modes (text, images, audio) and feedback mechanisms during the learning process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
